ModMetaData.name: Upscaled Pawnmorpher
ModMetaData.author: Vitamin Cera
ModMetaData.description:
My First mod here so I'm sorry if there are any bugs,but it's just textures so everything should be ok.
Some are changed completely and others are just upscaled for use on the IMOZOU Face mod.
Should be loaded after pawnmorpher, alpha animals, martens, and the insectiod version of pawnmorpher.
Might look a little weird if used on anything else :) I have not tested it with other faces, feel free to!
Might downscale this later :)
TO DO: -the mid transformations -maybe the ears/tails (definately upscale the boomalopes ears/horns) -Rework rat -and actually work on Laborador
Small update: My dyslexic self decided to switch up the names of the cat faces whoops.
